variables.description: The name or ARN of the Auto Scaling group.
variables.name: AutoScalingGroupName

variables.description: The number of Amazon EC2 instances that should be running in the Auto Scaling group.
variables.name: DesiredCapacity

variables.description: The time in UTC for this schedule to end. For example,                      2010-06-01T00:00:00Z.
variables.name: EndTime

variables.description: The maximum number of Amazon EC2 instances in the Auto Scaling group.
variables.name: MaxSize

variables.description: The minimum number of Amazon EC2 instances in the Auto Scaling group.
variables.name: MinSize

variables.description: The time in UTC when recurring future actions will start. You specify the start                   time by following the Unix cron syntax format. For more information about cron                   syntax, go to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cron.
variables.name: Recurrence

variables.description: The time in UTC for this schedule to start. For example,                      2010-06-01T00:00:00Z.
variables.name: StartTime
